Abstract:
This package for &GAP; 4 (at least version 4.4) provides routines for computations with Residue Class-Wise Affine mappings (in short rcwa-mappings) of the ring \Z, its semilocalizations \Z_{(\pi)} and the polynomial rings GF( q )[ x ]. In particular it can be used for computing with bijective such mappings and infinite permutation groups generated by them.
It is completely written in the &GAP; language and neither contains nor requires external binaries.
The package &ResClasses; is needed for dealing with all of the basic residue classes stuff, and the package GRAPE is needed for dealing with certain graphs we associate to rcwa mappings.
For the documentation the package &GAPDoc; is needed.
&RCWA; must be installed in the pkg subdirectory of the &GAP; distribution.
